title: Ticket #5738: Add defaults for Slurm vars in batch_gahp.config
description: Slurm support was added in 8.5.3 and the blahp scripts make use of slurm_binpath and slurm_std_storage but they were not included in the batch_gahp.config file. We've added it to the OSG's blahp here: https://github.com/osg-bosco/BLAH/commit/532fb7f68a0d945381568dddb6b05de4a2ccc1e0.
remarks:
2016-Jun-21 14:38:18 by jfrey:
The default for slurm_binpath should match that of the other *_binpath settings, which uses which to search the PATH.

slurm_std_storage was copied from pbs_std_storage, which doesn't have an entry in the config file. They are admin debugging aids and may not merit mention in the config file.

2016-Jul-27 14:57:50 by jfrey:
This ticket doesn't change any behavior. I don't believe it needs a version history entry.
check_ins: 2016-Jun-22 10:27   Check-in [48611]: Add default slurm_binpath to blahp config file. #5738 (By Jaime Frey )
